objects.name: Place
objects.admin_descr: Int. Value = Place Id, i.e. in what Deck or Place on the Board this Card currently lies

objects.name: Number
objects.admin_descr: Int. Value = number displayed on a Widget (picture+icon). Eligible only for [Widget] Card Types.

objects.name: Show Duration
objects.admin_descr: Int. If attr >0, enables the Timer widget on the Card (timer number = attr value)

objects.name: Token Slots
objects.admin_descr: Int. The number of Token Slots on the Card

objects.name: Type
objects.admin_descr: enum. 1 = Creature, 2 = Token, 3 = Event, 4 = Building, 5 = Eclipse

objects.name: Creature Number
objects.admin_descr: Int. Creature's slot number. Useful for stuff like 'affects all Creatures in slots 2 & 4"

objects.name: Token Count
objects.admin_descr: Int. Displays the current number of Tokens on the Card

objects.name: Token Type
objects.admin_descr: Int. Used to address tokens of specific Type (i.e. Hot)

objects.name: Token Origin
objects.admin_descr: Int. Place Id where the token originated (for animation)

objects.name: Highlighted
objects.admin_descr: Bool. If >0 - card gets a shiny border

objects.name: Slot
objects.admin_descr: Int. Slot number for tokens

objects.name: Linked Card Id
objects.admin_descr: Int. Card Id of the token's parent card

objects.name: Animation - Destroy
objects.admin_descr: Bool. Any change in this Attr triggers death animation for the Card

objects.name: Animation - Token Flight
objects.admin_descr: Bool. If >0 - triggers token flight animation from Card X to Card Y

objects.name: Animation - Token Origin Card
objects.admin_descr: Int. Origin card for token flight animation

objects.name: Animation - Token Origin Slot
objects.admin_descr: Int. Origin slot for token flight animation (optional)

objects.name: Destroyed
objects.admin_descr: Bool. If >0 - the object will be destroyed in the next update

objects.name: Anim Highlight
objects.admin_descr: Bool. If >0 - card gets a shiny border

objects.name: Anti Token
objects.admin_descr: Token counterpart for current token

objects.name: To destroy (DEPRECATED)
objects.admin_descr: Token will be destroyed after animation

objects.name: Animation - Token Origin Place
objects.admin_descr: Int. Origin place for token flight animation

objects.name: Order
objects.admin_descr: Int. Value = order of the card in Eclipse Card places with more than 1 Card

objects.name: Animation - Card Flight
objects.admin_descr: Bool. If >0 - triggers card flight animation from Place X to Place Y

objects.name: Animation - Card Origin Place
objects.admin_descr: Int. Origin place for card flight animation

objects.name: Reactive token
objects.admin_descr: Bool. Token can use 'on Token Added' actions to react to new linked tokens

objects.name: Sample Tooltip
objects.text: I'm just a simple tooltip with icon , bold, size, and even COLOR

objects.name: {DEPRECATED} Input lock
objects.admin_descr: Used for blocking player input when it's not player turn

objects.name: Fast mode
objects.admin_descr: Bool. Shortens pause times when > 0

objects.name: Loogris Branch
objects.admin_descr: Bool. Enables Loogris' experimental behaviours

objects.name: Number of non-creatures drawn
objects.admin_descr: Int. Number of non-creatures drawn in a row
